sentence.Network_en: This may help to maintain the gains you've made and to prevent backsliding.
sentence.Network_cn: 这或许有助于保持你所取得的进展，防止倒退。

sentence.Network_en: This means that the system only improves, always notching forward, never backsliding.
sentence.Network_cn: 这意味着系统只能够被改进, 总是向前的, 从不会倒退.

sentence.Network_en: And the LORD said unto me, The backsliding Israel hath justified herself more than treacherous Judah.
sentence.Network_cn: 耶和华对我说, 背道的以色列比奸诈的犹大还显为义.

三不退 The three non-backslidings, i.e. from position attained, from line of action pursued, and in dhyāna. 三世The three periods, 过去, 现在.

entry.def: If you accuse someone of backsliding, you disapprove of them because they have failed to do something they promised or agreed to do, or have started again doing something undesirable that they had previously stopped doing.

example.ex: ...the government's backsliding on free market reforms...
example.tran: 政府在自由市场改革上的退缩

example.ex: This may help to maintain the gains you've made and to prevent backsliding.
example.tran: 这或许有助于保持你所取得的进展，防止倒退。

means.word_mean: 1. a failure to maintain a higher state

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now, two years after the earthquake, Haiti is backsliding again.
